name: Returns the value of attribute name
format: Returns the value of attribute format
include: Returns the value of attribute include
exclude: Returns the value of attribute exclude
klass: Returns the value of attribute klass
model: Returns the value of attribute model
_default_wrap_model:
Determine the wrapper model from the controller's name. By convention,
this could be done by trying to find the defined model that has the
same singularize name as the controller. For example, +UsersController+
will try to find if the +User+ model exists.

This method also does namespace lookup. Foo::Bar::UsersController will
try to find Foo::Bar::User, Foo::User and finally User.
